duration_raw: until the start of your next turn
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 10" pfs="Standard">
[Indestructibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=1573)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 338 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the start of your next turn
</row>

</column>

---

You sever yourself from cause and effect. For the duration of the spell, you are immune to any effect or damage that would harm you, excluding effects caused by artifacts, deific power, and similarly powerful sources. You can selectively allow yourself to be affected by anything you're willing to have affect you.
name: Indestructibility

<additional-info>
**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 338 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

---

<summary>
Become briefly immune to everything.
</summary>
text: Indestructibility Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 338 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Divine, Occult, Primal Spell Lists Elemental Duration until the start of your next turn --- You sever yourself from cause and effect. For the duration of the spell, you are immune to any effect or damage that would harm you, excluding effects caused by artifacts, deific power, and similarly powerful sources. You can selectively allow yourself to be affected by anything you're willing to have affect you.
